name: MySQL5
queryCode:
SELECT
    t1.GROUPCODE,
    t1.GROUPID,
    t1.GROUPNAME,
    t1.GROUPSCOPE,
    t1.MEMO
FROM (
         SELECT
             t1.GROUPCODE,
             t1.GROUPID,
             t1.GROUPNAME,
             t1.GROUPSCOPE,
             t1.MEMO
         FROM IBZWFGROUP t1
         union
         SELECT distinct
             t1.ROLETAG as GROUPCODE,
             concat(SRFDCID,concat('-',t1.ROLETAG)) as GROUPID,
             t1.SYS_ROLENAME as GROUPNAME,
             'USERGROUP' as GROUPSCOPE,
             t1.MEMO
         FROM ibzrole t1 where SRFDCID is not null and ROLETAG  not in (select GROUPCODE from ibzwfgroup)
     ) t1
